website_summaries.verdict: This set includes three small glass terrariums that look great in a window.
pros: These teeny terrariums are ideal for air plants
They create a floating effect when hung with fishing line
They measure 3" in diameter at the widest point, with 1.75-inch openings
cons: Some customers were surprised by just how small these are

customer_reviews.title: Small but beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful little glass holders, and very well made. I knew they would be small, and they are. But my teeny tiny air plant is cozy and safely nestled inside one now, and seems perfectly happy. I used one to gift a different variety air plant to a friend, and that one is pouring out the opening... so in hindsight I wish I had purchased a larger size. Eventually, my little "Tilly" will outgrown her glass living room and will have to be moved to larger quarters. Ah well, parenting is never easy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tear drops of earth
customer_reviews.text: These are really small. Smaller than expected. I think about 3" in diameter. But they look beautiful when you fill them up. Gave these as gifts and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cross

customer_reviews.title: I'm kind of obsessed 😍
customer_reviews.text: I just spent the past few hours decorating my house and I'm so in love! I originally bought these back in summer to stick some succulents in and enjoy, but I procrastinated a bit and fall came around. I bought a bunch of $1 decorations from Walmart, stuck them in the terrariums and now I have an amazing windowsill! Just a few tips on these... - Think outside the box! These terrariums can be used for more than just succulents. - Hang with fishing line if you want to go for the "floating" effect. - The terrariums will not stay in place, they spin all day, but I anchored mine to the window with a bit of fishing line.
customer_reviews.author: Keara Laessig

customer_reviews.title: Bought to replace a broken terrarium. They are what ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a broken terrarium. They are what I was looking for, except they are smaller than what I am needing. Delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: GLH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These look great. I made each a beach scene with air plants and hung them in my room by the window. Only complaint is that the openings are too low, and it makes it hard to keep sand in it, since it pours out even if there is just a shallow layer. So, growing anything in these would be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay A.

customer_reviews.title: Durable & pretty in a sunny window
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several different styles of hanging glass "bubbles" and I like them all! The teardrop style is pretty hanging in the window with beach glass in it. I accidentally dropped one as I was hanging it, and surprisingly the only part that broke was the loop at the top. Since it has ventilation holes all around, I just threaded the line through 2 holes and hung it, without dropping it! I will be purchasing more for the rest of my glass.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasing to look at, I love the pear shape that these have. Smaller than I expected, but was able to fit a single air plant in with bedding (ground walnut shells). The glass seems well made and did not break as it banged against the wall a few times during hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to put few Tillandsia in them and decorate the shelf which holds my prized 35 year old speakers under my projector screen..Everyone loves it! I wish there were larger size available though..
customer_reviews.author: N. Bhasin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, value and look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, value and look. I am very happy with this purchase. These are quite light and transparent, I used mine for succulents and are hanging from curtain rod. Consider that the specified height is for the outside; the inner space from the bottom to where the top narrows to become a cone is about 3 to 3.5 inches. I doubt you will be disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Stingray

customer_reviews.title: Great Glass Terrarium for Air Plants
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little terrarium for air plants. I sit the plant in moss in the glass terrarium. What I really like is that it is enclosed so that I can spray water into the terrarium. The little terrarium also has a hole in its top so that you could hang it which is a very nice feature. Because it is glass, the 3 terrariums were all individually nicely boxed when shipped, so nothing was damaged. I definitely recommend the little glass terrarium.
customer_reviews.author: HappyAmazonCamper

customer_reviews.title: Made a well appreciated gift.
customer_reviews.text: All I need to say is the gift was very appreciated, and used immediately. Well packed and arrived quickly. It is a good size for Tillandsia but some smaller succulents work well also. The large opening in the front is great for misting.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for any little project
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for being as advertised ....and for the ridiculous amount of packaging. Cute and perfect for any little project...... Sadly one of them broke upon delivery even in all that packaging...I need it for a gift I'm making this week so I cannot return them or figure out how to contact them :(
customer_reviews.author: Deva Grace

customer_reviews.title: The other two are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, one arrived broken. They're very fragile, so I suppose that's to be expected. Probably more the fault of the delivery service than anyone. Going to try to cover up the crack with some glue so that it's usable. The other two are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The are super cute and I will be using them to hang from the ceiling in my daughter's room with little rocks and shells. The glass is lightweight, but feels sturdy and not too fragile. Overall, I am super happy with this purchase! Also, they arrived quickly and packaged nicely, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted and amazingly fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: These look lovely, just what I wanted, super quick delivery and that was without Prime!! Ordered late afternoon and they arrived the next day !
customer_reviews.author: nicola breading

customer_reviews.title: These are nice, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, but smaller than expected. The product information chart says, "6.3 x 6 x 5.9 inches" But that is not correct. The description of the item (which I overlooked and skipped right to the product information) says, "5.5 inches tall with a maximum diameter of 3" This is the more accurate size.
customer_reviews.author: Whisper

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to measure your plants! These are much smaller than I expected and so far I’ve been unable to use. No wonder the price was so good, they’re half the size I expected. I think I expected a 6” diameter, and they’re maybe 3” across... about the size of a holiday ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Stack

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated and hole to put plant in small ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated and hole to put plant in small and low leaving little front lip to keep soil and water in.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy. Holes built in for hanging. I put air plants in, which died, but that wasn’t the fault of these adorable glass beauties.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Love
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the mini-charm I was looking for! A dear friend admired the equally charming antique glass air-plant hangers in an Airbnb kitchen window; this gift arrived just ahead of the air plants and blue sand packet I ordered at the same time. She'll be so happily surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Allen

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is ok but needs better packaging. They are small and a little difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: The first box arrived as a box of shattered glass pieces that spilled all over when I first opened it. Had to return and re-purchase. Product itself is ok but needs better packaging. They are small and a little difficult to get things through the entrance to arrange inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite little hanging terrariums. They were just as expected and packaged well
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Came packaged very well, so there was no breakage or scratches. Put little air plants inside each one and arranged them on a glass plate. Spray them every day.

customer_reviews.title: They are small for little candle wanted to put a plant but didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I like them new they were small.Would’ve preferred it a little bigger I used it for my sisters wedding centerpiece for the tables

customer_reviews.title: very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: arrive carefully packed and all in tact--I bought them to balance out some larger 7 inch tear drops, using them as airplane terrariums. Love them--they catch the light like bubbles!

customer_reviews.title: They are hanging in my window with air plants now.
customer_reviews.text: A fun return to the 60"s and 70"s. They make me smile.

customer_reviews.title: Love them! We have them hanging in the kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! We have them hanging in the kitchen window with air plants inside. We get compliments all the time. I wish the hook on the top was closed though. The open hook is sturdy and will most likely not fail or slip but I'd have more confidence in a closed loop.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze B.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for Mother's Day gifts & it worked out perfect as I have 2 mother-in-law's. I filled them with preserved moss & air plants & they all absolutely loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They have a flat bottom so you ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a birthday present from my daughter. I love them. They have a flat bottom so you can hang them or not. They are not very big so you can only put small plants in them but that is okay because my plants are small right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small.  Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are very small. They look much larger in the picture. Additionally, the hole to add plants etc. is so small it will be difficult to do anything with these.

customer_reviews.title: They are bigger than expected and they looked great when we finished our plant project
customer_reviews.text: We used these as a class project for plants. They are bigger than expected and they looked great when we finished our plant project. I had a broken one and the company replaced it right away.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute exactly what I expected of it. It is very delicate which is something to keep in mind with the handling. Comes in alittle dusty but nothing that a good wash can't fix. Very satisfied with this item

customer_reviews.title: Glass and Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape, and are so cute. I intend to hang these in the bathroom since they are drop shaped. This will provide extra moisture for the plants too.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These Terrariums are well made with thick enough glass that I wasn't worried about breaking it in my hand. Great for the price. Im very happy

customer_reviews.title: whimsy!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i thought but adorable, functional..whimsy. I have them hanging by twine in my 3 paned dining room window, and put a chicks n hen in them wuth a touch of soil, plants akready sprouting with more chicks..i water rarely but when I do I use a tablespoon lol

customer_reviews.title: Great value and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value and have been a nice way to display some air plants I also ordered. They actually came with better instructions on taking care of the plants than came with the plants. Look great hanging near a window or pass through opening in your home.

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute and they are perfect for small hanging terrariums
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and they are perfect for small hanging terrariums. I filled three up and they look so delicate and springy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but rather small. I wouldn't recommend this for succulents. The hole is small and can only fit young plants. I tried to layer sand, pebbles, and soil, but the opening is so low that it makes it difficult to do that without falling out. Overall, I am slightly disappointed, but I will find another use for them.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They hang from my ceiling and have airplants in them. So cute.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived fast and in great condition. The size is great as I wanted a larger one. Great deal. They hold air plants well and look stunning. Glass is nice and not super thin.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

product_meta.title: Best Value! Hanging Terrarium 3 Pack! Small 5.5" Glass Hanging Teardrop Plant Terrariums from Glass Home Gardens
product_meta.description: These lovely small hanging teardrop terrarium are 5.5 inches tall with a maximum diameter of 3 inches and a 1.75 in opening. They're perfect for floating air plants, ornaments, tiny garden scenes, or painted with a votive candle. The possibilities are limitless! The kids will love them! We include the Glass Home Gardens "Guide to Air Plants"
feature_bullets: Tremendous Value! 3 Small 5.5 inch tall Teardrop terrariums. 3 inches diameter at widest point with an opening 1.75 inches.
Great for Air Plants (Tillandsia, Bromelaid family). We include the
Fantastic for crafting holiday ornaments or hanging garden scenes
Perfect for children's art projects (under supervision)
Clear glass orb for full spectrum light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
